Class LockedWeakList<T>

Namespace
osu.Framework.Lists
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A IWeakList<T> which locks all operations.

public class LockedWeakList<T> : IWeakList<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable where T : class
